channel.title: Box2D Physics Engine for AS 3.0
channel.description: Well recently i've been getting to grips with this physics engine for actionscript and i must say its powerful. I think it works brilliantly anyone looking to add physics to their games should consider using this. http://box2dflash.sourceforge.net/ there is a demonstration of it on there site
